summary: The diff implements OCR-based image upload infrastructure with canvas utilities, text parsing helpers, and form integration. However, the core OCR library (tesseract.js) is intentionally not installed, leaving all OCR functionality as a placeholder that throws user-friendly errors. The implementation provides the structural foundation but does not deliver functional OCR extraction capabilities.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add tesseract.js as a frontend dependency to enable OCR processing of uploaded scout report images
missing_requirements.reason: tesseract.js is not added to frontend/package.json. The ocrExtraction.ts file contains a comment stating it's a placeholder and requires tesseract.js to be manually installed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Create extractScoutFromImage utility function that performs full-image OCR and extracts structured data
missing_requirements.reason: extractScoutFromImage is defined but only throws a placeholder error message instead of performing OCR processing. No tesseract.js integration exists.
